code: import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import useFetch from"./useFetch";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BlogDetails=function BlogDetails(){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var _useFetch=useFetch('http://localhost:8000/blogs/'+id),blog=_useFetch.data,error=_useFetch.error,isPending=_useFetch.isPending;var navigate=useNavigate();var handleClick=function handleClick(){fetch('http://localhost:8000/blogs/'+blog.id,{method:'DELETE'}).then(function(){navigate('/');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-details",children:[isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error}),blog&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Written by ",blog.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:blog.body}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,children:"delete"})]})]});};export default BlogDetails;
